fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, attack a player.
- During a New Moon, check a player to learn if they can threaten you or not.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Overprotective Defense in Full Moon nights.
- Basic Defense and Detection Immunity in New Moon nights.
- Poisons, Plagues, and Ignitions while being Doused will bypass your defense.
- Each attack against you in a Full Moon night will cut off one of your heads, reducing your attack. If your attack is reduced to None, you will die, and only one attacker will be given credit fot the kill.
- Your heads and attack level are fully regrown after the end of each night.
- A playee can threaten you as long as they are capable of one of the following: Poisoning, Plagueing, Dousing, Igniting, or using three or more attacks on a single target in a single night.

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enhancement: Three-pronged Chomp:
fields.value: - You will also attack up to 2 of your target's visitors. If there are less than 2 visitors to attack, leftover attacks will go to your target instead.
